channel.title: High-Availability on Ebby Builds!
channel.description: Recent content in High-Availability on Ebby Builds!

item.title: Azure Will Stay Up. Your System Is a Different Story.
item.description: Azure’s infrastructure is genuinely reliable. That’s exactly the problem. The more stable the platform, the easier it is to mistake platform health for system health, and that gap is where the expensive outages live. Availability is an architectural choice, not a SKU.
